languages.text: "Я думала, мы — союзники. Но если ты желаешь оспорить мою власть... изволь". {n}Чорда прикасается к панели в поручне, и отражающее поле немедленно активируется. Вы слышите, как вдалеке звучат тревожные сирены.{/n}

"I thought you and I were allies. But if you wish to challenge my authority... you are welcome to try." {n}Incendia touches a panel on the throne's armrest and is immediately shielded by a refractor field. You hear the sounds of alarms going off in the distance.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Я думала, мы — союзники. Но если ты желаешь оспорить мою власть... изволь". {n}Чорда прикасается к панели в поручне, и отражающее поле немедленно активируется. Вы слышите, как вдалеке звучат тревожные сирены.{/n}

traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda

languages.text: “我本以为我们是盟友，可如果你打算挑战我的权威……你大可以试试。”{n}因森蒂娅碰了一下宝座上的面板，整个宝座立刻被罩在了偏折力场里。你听到远处传来了警报声。”{/n}
languages.original_text: "I thought you and I were allies. But if you wish to challenge my authority... you are welcome to try." {n}Incendia touches a panel on the throne's armrest and is immediately shielded by a refractor field. You hear the sounds of alarms going off in the distance.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “我本以为我们是盟友，可如果你打算挑战我的权威……你大可以试试。”{n}因森蒂娅碰了一下宝座上的面板，整个宝座立刻被罩在了偏折力场里。你听到远处传来了警报声。”{/n}
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda

languages.text: 「私達は味方同士だと思っていた。だが、我が政権に抵抗するつもりなのなら…勝手にするがいい」{n}インセンディアが王座の肘掛けにあるパネルに触れると、即座にリフラクター・フィールドに守られる。遠くで警告音が鳴り始めた。{/n}
languages.original_text: "I thought you and I were allies. But if you wish to challenge my authority... you are welcome to try." {n}Incendia touches a panel on the throne's armrest and is immediately shielded by a refractor field. You hear the sounds of alarms going off in the distance.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「私達は味方同士だと思っていた。だが、我が政権に抵抗するつもりなのなら…勝手にするがいい」{n}インセンディアが王座の肘掛けにあるパネルに触れると、即座にリフラクター・フィールドに守られる。遠くで警告音が鳴り始めた。{/n}
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda

languages.text: «Pensé que éramos {mf|aliados|aliadas}, pero si desea desafiar mi autoridad... puede intentarlo». {n}Incendia toca un panel del reposabrazos del trono e inmediatamente le protege un campo refractor. Se oyen alarmas a lo lejos.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I thought you and I were allies. But if you wish to challenge my authority... you are welcome to try." {n}Incendia touches a panel on the throne's armrest and is immediately shielded by a refractor field. You hear the sounds of alarms going off in the distance.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Pensé que éramos {mf|aliados|aliadas}, pero si desea desafiar mi autoridad... puede intentarlo». {n}Incendia toca un panel del reposabrazos del trono e inmediatamente le protege un campo refractor. Se oyen alarmas a lo lejos.{/n}
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda

languages.text: "Ich dachte, wir wären Verbündete. Aber wenn Ihr meine Autorität anzweifeln wollt ... dürft Ihr es gerne versuchen." {n}Incendia berührt ein Feld auf der Armlehne des Throns, der daraufhin sofort von einem Refraktorfeld umschlossen wird. Du hörst in der Ferne Alarmglocken schrillen.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I thought you and I were allies. But if you wish to challenge my authority... you are welcome to try." {n}Incendia touches a panel on the throne's armrest and is immediately shielded by a refractor field. You hear the sounds of alarms going off in the distance.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Ich dachte, wir wären Verbündete. Aber wenn Ihr meine Autorität anzweifeln wollt ... dürft Ihr es gerne versuchen." {n}Incendia berührt ein Feld auf der Armlehne des Throns, der daraufhin sofort von einem Refraktorfeld umschlossen wird. Du hörst in der Ferne Alarmglocken schrillen.{/n}
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda

languages.text: « Je croyais que nous étions {mf|alliés|alliées}, mais si vous préférez défier mon autorité... essayez donc, je vous en prie. » {n}Incendia presse un bouton sur l'accoudoir de son trône, activant immédiatement un champ réfracteur. Vous entendez des alarmes se déclencher au loin.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I thought you and I were allies. But if you wish to challenge my authority... you are welcome to try." {n}Incendia touches a panel on the throne's armrest and is immediately shielded by a refractor field. You hear the sounds of alarms going off in the distance.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Je croyais que nous étions {mf|alliés|alliées}, mais si vous préférez défier mon autorité... essayez donc, je vous en prie. » {n}Incendia presse un bouton sur l'accoudoir de son trône, activant immédiatement un champ réfracteur. Vous entendez des alarmes se déclencher au loin.{/n}
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda

languages.text: "İkimizin müttefik olduğunu düşünmüştüm. Yetkime meydan okumak istiyorsan bunu denemekte özgürsün." {n}İncendia'nın tahtın kolçağındaki bir panele dokunmasıyla etrafını bir ışıkkıran alanı sarıyor. İleride alarmların çalmaya başladığını duyuyorsun.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I thought you and I were allies. But if you wish to challenge my authority... you are welcome to try." {n}Incendia touches a panel on the throne's armrest and is immediately shielded by a refractor field. You hear the sounds of alarms going off in the distance.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "İkimizin müttefik olduğunu düşünmüştüm. Ama yetkime meydan okumak istiyorsan, bunu denemekte özgürsün." {n}İncendia, tahtın kolçağındaki bir panele dokunuyor ve anında bir ışıkkıran alanıyla kaplanıyor. İleride alarmların çalmaya başladığını duyuyorsun.{/n}
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda
